name: Late Christmas
description:
Late Christsmas, a game by made in 2019/2020

This is a Christmas Exchange game made for Glorious Trainwrecks user AKAIR

CONTROLS
WASD move, E to interact, use the mouse to select dialog options
Space Bar to Jump
Escape to Quit the game anytime

"Rain, Moderate, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
